item.title: farm-for-your-life-
item.description: Isometric 3D work in the PyGame library Inspired by titles like Harvest Moon, I thought it would be fun to lay the groundwork for a farming sim for my first from-scratch game using the PyGame library. Some cool features: isometric grid is built map generation can be randomized assets were all hand-made https://github.com/joops-glitch/farm-for-yourlife-
